thread.title: Spain Joins List of Market Worries

author: Jon Sindreu
title: Spain Joins List of Market Worries
text: Investors’ growing list of political concerns for this year just got a bit bigger, as Spain’s leadership was called into question. On Friday, the country’s benchmark stock index, the IBEX 35, fell 1.7% after the main opposition party filed a no-confidence motion that could end up unseating Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy.
